source.ae2db464:
#line chart without order has no meaning 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
data.age.value_counts().plot.line()
plt.show()
source.5ea68079:
#Line chart work only with ordinal not nominal
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
data.age.value_counts().sort_index().plot.line()
plt.show()

source.5527fcf6:
import pandas as pd

aapl= pd.read_csv('../input/lecture9/AAPL.csv')

aapl.head()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.figure(figsize=(15,5) )
#aapl[['Date', 'Open']]
aapl['Open'].plot.line()
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(15,5) )
aapl['Volume'].plot.line()
plt.show()
